mapper.sql: id, clubId, createId, maxMember, name, password, cardNum, icon, notice, kindOf, currentMember, status ,createTime, totalLiveness
mapper.select: select club.id, club.clubId, club.createId, club.maxMember, club.name, club.password, club.cardNum, club.icon, club.notice, club.kindOf, club.currentMember, club.status ,club.createTime,club.totalLiveness, member.id as member_id,member.userId,member.status as member_status,member.guessCount, member.unauditedLiveness,member.totalLiveness,member.joinTime,member.quitTime from guess_club as club left join guess_club_member as member on member.clubId = club.clubId where club.clubId = #{clubId} and club.createId = #{createId} and club.status != -1

select club.id, club.clubId, club.createId, club.maxMember, club.name, club.password, club.cardNum, club.icon, club.notice, club.kindOf, club.currentMember, club.status ,club.createTime,club.totalLiveness, tmp.id as tmp_id,tmp.subject as tmp_subject,tmp.label as tmp_label,tmp.kindOf as tmp_kindOf, tmp.topicType as tmp_topicType,tmp.orderBy as tmp_orderBy,tmp.clubId as tmp_clubId,tmp.userId as tmp_userId, tmp.createTime as tmp_createTime, opt.templateId,opt.name as opt_name,opt.formula as opt_formula,opt.orderBy as opt_orderBy,opt.odds as opt_odds,opt.createTime as opt_createTime from guess_club AS club LEFT JOIN guess_template AS tmp ON tmp.clubId = club.clubId LEFT JOIN guess_template_option AS opt ON tmp.id = opt.templateId where club.kindOf = #{kindOf} and club.cardNum >= #{minBlance} and club.status != -1 and tmp.status != 0 order by tmp.orderBy,opt.orderBy;

select count(0) from guess_club where createId = #{createId} and status != -1
and name = #{name}
